name: Legend of Ares
description: Legend of Ares is a MMORPG set in a medieval fantasy featuring the God of War, Ares mythology. Players can choose two different faction to join either The Empire or The Alliance featuring four different classes Knight, Spearman, Archer, and Sorcerer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98 Processor: Pentium 3 (700GHz) Graphics: 128MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 15 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Pentium 3 (700GHz) Graphics: 256MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
